website_ideas.name: SkillBridge
website_ideas.description: A peer-to-peer learning platform where users can trade skills via live video sessions or tutorials (e.g., guitar for coding).
website_ideas.target_audience: Lifelong learners, hobbyists, students, and freelancers
website_ideas.monetization_strategy: Freemium model with premium features (e.g., unlimited trades, advanced analytics), optional tipping, and sponsored content.

website_ideas.name: EcoCart
website_ideas.description: A marketplace for sustainable and eco-friendly products that provides transparency about sourcing, carbon footprint, and environmental impact.
website_ideas.target_audience: Eco-conscious consumers, green startups, and ethical brands
website_ideas.monetization_strategy: Commission from product sales, featured vendor placements, and affiliate links.

technology_stack.hosting: Vercel + AWS S3 for static files

website_ideas.name: RemoteCrate
website_ideas.description: A curated job board and resource hub for remote-first companies and digital nomads.
website_ideas.target_audience: Remote workers, freelancers, digital nomads, and startups hiring globally
core_features: Nomad visa guides and cost-of-living tools
website_ideas.monetization_strategy: Paid job postings, premium subscriptions for applicants (e.g., resume feedback, early access), and newsletter sponsorships.
